Package index

Main Functions

goodness_of_fit_mCMP()
Goodness-of-Fit Tests for the mCMP Distribution
dcmp()
The Conway-Maxwell Poisson Probability Mass Function
simulate_mcmp_sample()
Simulate Random Samples from the mCMP Distribution

Parameter Estimation

estimate_mu_phi()
Estimate mCMP Parameters by Minimizing S(mu, phi) (Internal Helper)
S_objective()
Objective Function for Estimation (Internal Helper)

Stein-based Functions

estimate_rho_mCMP()
Estimator of rho_X(k) (Internal Helper)
compute_hat_rho_vec()
Vectorized rho_X for k = 0 to r (Internal Helper)
compute_mod_statistics()
Compute Goodness-of-Fit Test Statistics (Internal Helper)

Internal/Helper Functions

compute_Z()
Compute Normalizing Constant (Internal)
